Room.Name: Shrine Entry
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the magnificient entry to the Holy Order of Corellon Larethian.
Room.LongDescription: The high ceiling appears to be covered with gold foil, inlaid with precious gems. The wavering flames of the high set torches produce a dancing sparkle which is beautiful to behold. Everywhere you look you see evidence of elven quality workmanship. This one entry room alone must be worth the ransom of a couple of kings. There is a sign in the elven language on the wall near the east door.
